name: Discussionboard
tagline: Discussion Board Application for Sharing Thoughts
body:
### Welcome to Discussion Board

![main image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shawnlee5482/DiscussionBoard/master/discussionboard_login.png)

![topic screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shawnlee5482/DiscussionBoard/master/discussionboard_topicdetail.png)

Discussion Board application enables user to discuss with other people for the specific topic.

User can create topics and add multiple posts for the topic and comment on the posts.

### Add Topic
User can create a topic by using name, description and photos. For example, user can initiate discussion about a new laptop computer by uploading a camera image. 

### Post
User can add multiple posts to the topic. Other user and topic owner itself can add posts.
Posts also can include images. 

### Image source
Thanks to [FilePicker library](https://www.filestack.com/), user can add images from multiple sources.
For example, from local computer, take a photo now, Google drive, Facebook, etc..

### User can vote for other person's posts
If user likes some post, user can add up vote. (down vote for the dislikes)

### Statistics
User can check their statistics (number of topics, posts, comments)

### Personal Profile
User can check personal profile

### Live Demo
[Click Here for Live Demo](http://ec2-54-236-203-12.compute-1.amazonaws.com/)

### Used Skills
`MongoDB`, `Express`, `AngularJS`, `Node.JS`, `Bootstrap`, `Filepicker libary`, `JWT Auth`, `Grunt`, `Less`, `Karma/Jasmine`
